name: Breakers Revenge! Classic 2d fighting game for the iPhone!
blurb: I'm bringing the 2d classic fighting game to the iPhone, putting some fighting fun in your pocket!

rewards.reward: HEY NOW! If you can give any amount of money, starting at $1, you will receive backers-only updates  on Kickstarter. We appreciate your financial support to our project!.

CHARACTER FOR ALL 2 SEE  -Right along with the backers-only updates, you will receive an  original papercraft design of a character from the game. not available to the general public. These Papercraft model designs can be printed, colored and folded to create a character from Breakers Revenge!   Put \u2018em on your desk for all to see or at home on your shelf in your room. Your friends will envy you!
YOUR NAME ON THE WALL -   You will receieve all that is mentioned above, plus your name will be added to a "special thanks" section of the credits created specifically for backers!

LISTEN UP - In addition to all previous rewards we will also email you the sound-track to the game in MP3 format. You will receive every song from the game (such as the one in the video) and a collection of every character\u2019s sound effects and voices. Thats over 30 tracks!

COLLECT THEM ALL - Backers will get everything, already mentioned plus a set of Breakers Revenge trading cards! You remember trading cards right? We bet you do! Each card will contain a character from the game with their stats and origin on the back. Also it will list your name as a Breakers Backer on the back of the card! International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA
FIRST DIBS - In addition to all of the previous rewards you will receive a free copy of the game at the same time it is released to reviewers! This reward is only available to this backer level.

ONE OF  A KIND - All of the above, plus a limited edition art print signed by myself and my team (size to be determined, but we are thinking in the realm of 11x17), available only to backers. (International backers please add $5 for shipping outside the USA)

LIMITED REWARD     3 of 3 remaining \r\n\r\nIS THAT YOU IN THE GAME? - You will be a character in the game, a background character in one of the stages. Youll be cheering on the fight watching as the two Breakers duel it out. Also along with this and all previous rewards, you will also receive lifetime free copies of any future digitally released games from Dreamawake Games.

A PLACE IN OUR HEARTS - All of the above (including being an in-game character), plus my lead character artist will personally illustrate an acrylic painting, on a 16x20 canvas, featuring a Breakers Revenge character of your choosing performing their signature moves... against you!. (Send us a few images of yourself for reference and we will make it happen!) The painting will be one of a kind and yours to keep. And if you are ever within a 200 mile radius of Maryland, I will personally drive to meet you, and take you out to eat with my family!

TEARS OF JOY -Wow oh wow. If you can back this amount to the Breakers Revenge project you are without a shadow of doubt family. You also have a deep love for the 2d fighting game genre and have generous deep pockets for support. If you can back Breakers Revenge at this level then you will receive all previous mentioned rewards and also creative input on all future games created by Dreamawake Games. You can serve as an official producer on the next game (if your time permits) I ill have Also I will personally treat you to dinner with my family (somewhere very nice!) .
